de.hadizadeh.positioning.viewer.content

Class ContentFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • de.hadizadeh.positioning.viewer.content.ContentFragment

  • public class ContentFragment
extends Fragment
    Fragment for managing multiple content fragments of different types and joining them in a tab view

      • compare

        public boolean compare(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.String image,
                       java.lang.String fullText,
                       java.lang.String audioFileName,
                       java.lang.String videoFileName)
        Compates the current fragment with data of another fragment
        Parameters:
        title - content title
        description - content description
        image - image
        fullText - long description text
        audioFileName - path to the audio file
        videoFileName - path to the video file
        Returns:
        true, if the data are same, else they are different
